description: This file contains CSS styles for the theme management and layout of a web application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container class for the application, applying theme and layout styles.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Style for the application logo, includes animation properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styles with layout and responsive adjustments.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styles for color transition and theming.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including hover and active states.
